name: Cupman Quest
description:
You're Cupman a young man that was born with a Cup Noodles instead of a head. Always in love with Gyazu, now is your time to shine. She will date you if you are able to reach her before the water used to cook your head cools down. Pick three shrimps in your way to add extra flavour to your story.

Controls: 

- WASD to move

- Space to jump (you can wall jump)

- Press R to restart

Credits

Art:  Jau3d

Else: Kinniku Raider

Music: Plastic Love [8 Bit Tribute to Mariya Takeuchi] - 8 Bit Universe
